string.name: main_text
string.Data:
"

VKeyboard

VKeyboard provides a new Android input method (disabled by default).

To activate it, follow these steps.

Add VKeyboard to the list of system input methods:

1. Open Manage on-screen keyboards

- Find VKeyboard and enable it.

- Confirm the warning displayed by the system. The system always shows this message when using a third-party keyboard.

- Click the Back button to return to this page..

2. Click "Choose input method".

- Select VKeyboard from the list.

3. Done!

"
